FuncDef: The reset mpls oam statistic-type ingress command clears MPLS OAM performance statistics for the ingress of an LSP.
CLIs: reset mpls oam statistic-type { lost-measure single-ended | delay-measure two-way } ingress { <tunnelName> | <tunnelType> <tunnelNum> }

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about frame loss measurement.
-

Clears statistics about single-ended frame loss measurement.
-

Clears statistics about frame delay measurement.
-

Clears statistics about two-way frame delay measurement.
-

Specifies the tunnel type and number.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI] reset mpls oam statistic-type lost-measure single-ended ingress Tunnel 3
ExtraInfo: To clear statistics about single-ended frame loss measurement, run the reset mpls oam statistic-type lost-measure single-ended ingress { tunnelName | tunnelType tunnelNum } command.To clear statistics about two-way frame delay measurement, run the reset mpls oam statistic-type delay-measure two-way ingress { tunnelName | tunnelType tunnelNum } command.
